    the depth of the moving average

    the local drift

    Methods

    double computeDrift() protected
    Compute and return the local drift. the attribute "drift" is updated

    Default constructor.

    Spot iteration.
    double getUpperThreshold() public
    Return the absolute upper threshold (with the drift)

    Return the absolute lower threshold (with the drift)

    Return the absolute thresholds (with the drift)

    Return the local drift.
    string log(int log_level) public
    Return the current state of the DSpot instance through a single line string.
    DSpotStatus status() public
    Get the internal state of the DSpot instance. overload Spot method

    Return the configuration of the DSpot instance. overload Spot method
    string stringStatus() public
    Format the status to print it.
    double getUpper_t() public
    Get the upper excess quantile. Overload Spot method (return the real absolute value with the drift)
    double getLower_t() public
    Get the lower excess quantile. Overload Spot method (return the real absolute value with the drift)
    double up_probability(double z) public
    Give the probability to observe things higher than a value.
    double down_probability(double z) public
    Give the probability to observe things lower than a value.
